com.googlecode.jaks.common.xml

Class XmlUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.jaks.common.xml.XmlUtil

  • public class XmlUtil
extends Object

    A collection of lightweight XML utility methods covering XML->DOM, DOM->XML, and XPath.

    A Note on Threaded Performance.
    This class is thread-safe, but significant portions are synchronized. If you are using XmlUtil across threads, you should consider creating one instance per thread.
    Author:
    Jason Smith

    • Method Detail

      • getDocumentBuilderFactory

        protected DocumentBuilderFactory getDocumentBuilderFactory()
        Gets the DocumentBuilderFactory used to create the builder for getBuilder(). Override this method to change the settings of the factory. Default is non-validating and namespace-aware.
        Returns:
        The DocumentBuilderFactory used to create the builder for getBuilder().

      • getBuilder

        protected final DocumentBuilder getBuilder()
        Gets the builder. Note that the builder is DocumentBuilder.reset() on every call to toDocument(InputSource), so it is safe to modify its configuration.
        Returns:
        The document builder.

        Get a new, empty Document.

        A new, empty Document.

      • toXml

        public void toXml(Node node,
         OutputStream output,
         String encoding,
         boolean declaration,
         boolean format)
           throws IOException
        Serialize a Document or other DOM node to XML.
        Parameters:
        node - The source DOM node.
        output - The target output stream (bytes).
        encoding - The text encoding.
        declaration - true to include the XML declaration in the output; false to omit.
        format - true to format the output for readability; false for raw output.
        Throws:
        IOException - See IOException.

        Gets a new XPath instance.
        Returns:

      • select

        protected <T> T select(QName returnType,
           Node node,
           String xpath,
           Namespace... namespaces)
            throws XPathExpressionException
        Generalized evaluation of an XPath 1.0 expression.
        Parameters:
        returnType - The return type. See XPathExpression.evaluate(Object, QName) and XPathConstants.
        node - The target node.
        xpath - The XPath expression.
        namespaces - The set of namespaces.
        Returns:
        The result(s).
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - See XPath.compile(String) and XPathExpression.evaluate(InputSource, QName).

      • selectNode

        Evaluate an XPath expression, returning the result as a node.
        Parameters:
        node - The target node.
        xpath - The XPath expression.
        namespaces - The set of namespaces.
        Returns:
        The result from the XPath expression.
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - See select(QName, Node, String, Namespace...).
